html:
9.25.22  3:00 pm   whats the best kind of sandwich

      nantwich

9.25.22  2:07 pm   Can you save the world from Californication?

      i was going to say yes, but now that i think about it no

9.25.22  2:15 pm   Im pretty good at playing instruments, but i suck at singing and coming up with lyrics. Any advice?

      you may be in the unique position of being able to write bad songs. enjoy it while you can

9.25.22  12:04 pm   what is something thats not safe for (a) work setting

      a picture of a buttock

9.25.22  10:42 am   I just finished writing the lyrics to the first verse of a song I'm making, but I'm stuck in the instrumental part ( I know the melody I want to go for, but don't know how to make it all come together). Do you have any advice?

      no, but, i think no advice is the best advice for this situation

9.25.22  10:03 am   Do you ever listen to songs in other languages just so you can pay attention to the music instead of getting caught up in the lyrics?

      the lyrics have never distracted me from the music in any song, regardless of language. however, the music occasionally distracts me from the lyrics

9.25.22  8:47 am   what color are dogs

      dog

9.25.22  6:35 am   thoughts on the location at 31.740145270801438 S, 115.76992128333318 E

      it looks lovely

9.25.22  6:00 am   what kind of other skills do you have other than music?

      i can tell the difference between good and bad weather

9.25.22  3:28 am   how to not be afraid to sing

      try this: talk when you're supposed to sing. and sing when you're supposed to talk. it might ease the pressure

9.25.22  3:09 am   i'm getting a piano soon, how hard is it to master the instrument?

      no one has mastered any instrument

9.25.22  1:51 am   why so serious?

      this is to provide the firm bedrock for humour and outrageousness to bloom out of

9.25.22  12:29 am   become christian or I'm unsubscribing

      i'll look into it

9.24.22  10:45 pm   What is your Kevin bacon number?

      3

9.24.22  9:37 pm   What is listening to music like after learning music theory

      it's about like how the day goes after the weather

9.24.22  8:27 pm   what's a good hand gesture

      high five

9.24.22  6:42 pm   What were you doing on the day of September 24, 2019?

      designing a dynamic display guide for my keyboard controls

9.24.22  5:01 pm   what's the story behind "christmas isn't real?"

      title first. the title i came up with was "the easter bunny told me that christmas isn't real, but santa claus is still jesus". then immediately after, i came up with the melody/chords for that much. this was september 21, 2018. it was selected 2 months later. i wrote the rest of the song accorduing to my standard songwriting procedures and practices. then recorded and produced the song. then made a video for it.

9.24.22  4:42 pm   you are both unrelatable and very relatable at the same time

      most people are

9.24.22  3:57 pm   Do you remember where you've been?

      i remember some of the places i've been, but i think i'd remember all of them if i went there again

9.24.22  3:03 pm   I'm pretty good at singing and coming up with lyrics, but I suck at playing instruments. Any advice?

      that's your express ticket into the avant-garde. grab an instrument, it's your turn

9.24.22  3:01 pm   what do I do to stop worrying about my ex whom I just broke up with

      you're going to have to start worrying about something else

9.24.22  2:56 pm   Can tomorrow be today?

      pretty soon

9.24.22  12:13 pm   i just noticed that the content on your site has a big gap between 2011 and 2013 when barely anything was released. What was it that you were doing during all of 2012?

      songwriting

9.24.22  9:12 am   how many songs have you listened to in your lifetime

      about 100,000

9.24.22  7:33 am   based on her appearance what do u think Mona Lisa's name would be

      dave

9.24.22  6:11 am   do you think autumn is unfair because it's more inviting to stay at home but also it's more intriguing to go outside at the same time? 

      that sounds pretty fair to me

9.24.22  3:10 am   Thoughts on college basketball and football

      the stakes are higher, because all the players know they're going to graduate soon so they have to score points as quickly as they can

9.24.22  1:42 am   how do i get over a horrifying and disgusting and graphic movie i wish i never even heard of thats keeping me up at night?

      the only solution to this is to write your own move that you'd rather see

9.24.22  12:22 am   did you teach yourself to animate for every song you make?

      just about

9.23.22  9:53 pm   Thoughts on flangers?

      too flangy

9.23.22  7:29 pm   You ever get sidetracked by your goals?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.23.22  5:03 pm   how u make good animations

      don't play the pieces, play the board

9.23.22  1:59 pm   What would be a really bad title for a song but a really good slogan in a political advertisement?

      it's difficult for me to think of anything that's not a great song title. almost everything is a great song title

9.23.22  1:47 pm   You write a lot of lyrics in your songs about love, have you fallen in love?

      i guess

9.23.22  11:32 am   how many trees are in a forest?

      1 million

9.23.22  8:16 am   What does "sing me a strong song" mean?

      sing me a song, strong

9.23.22  7:01 am   do you wear soft clothing a lot or just on special occasion 

      only on week days

9.23.22  3:33 am   why do we not all like the same things?

      because everything keeps changing, and we keep changing too. we are all in different states at different times. i think we all possibly do like the same things, but all at much different times

9.23.22  3:23 am   have you ever figured out the best way to figure things out

      no. it changes

9.23.22  12:54 am   thoughts on namibia?

      it's pretty good

9.22.22  10:30 pm   What was the first instrument you ever played

      piano, i suppose

9.22.22  8:35 pm   is it true that artists produce their best work when their mental health or emotional state is compromised?

     sometimes

      if it is, that kinda sucks and i feel bad for them

9.22.22  6:55 pm   how realistic do the 3D humans look in your next video?

      probably about the same as the ones in "i'm a huge gamer most of the time"

9.22.22  4:40 pm   Is there a story to "We Could Just Get High"?

     besides me writing a song, no

     It seems like there's an underlying message

     in songwriting i usually try my best to pull from underlying spirit

9.22.22  2:13 pm   Would it be plausible to interpret the line "at the end of the trail, there's a better trail that's a little more expensive" as a double meaning with "a little more expansive", similarly to other double-meaning phrases in your songs

      i didn't think of that, but i like it

9.22.22  11:21 am   Do you consider your music generally pan-diatonic?

     i've never heard that term but i just looked it up and the answer is absolutely not

     Do you think about the chords you're making as functional chords? 

     they are musical, and, musically functional

9.22.22  10:06 am   opinions on doors?

      openable

9.22.22  8:21 am   Old Hollywood or New Hollywood?

      what's the date

9.22.22  6:12 am   "Pave the way all the way from yesterday to another day." I love this line. You don't say "tomorrow," but "another day," as if there's no great expectation for the future. Nothing HAS to change from yesterday. The question is whether the road has been paved for change to take place eventually. Or no change whatsoever as you keep going down a more determined, safer road. It inspires resilience and perseverance even if you don't end up starting a revolution. Feeling proud of just "going through the motions" and working hard for yourself. And knowing you're not the only road-paver in this life, as lives touch each other to create love. 

      i understand
